title: Migrate GoReflaxeCompiler from manual module sweep to GenericCompiler callbacks
description: Current Reflaxe integration registers a BaseCompiler adapter and reuses legacy module-wide lowering in onCompileEnd. Move to GenericCompiler and compile class/enum entries through Reflaxe callbacks so we can leverage type usage tracking, module output partitioning, and hooks incrementally.
close_reason: Migrated GoReflaxeCompiler to callback-driven module selection via compileClass/compileEnum and validated full snapshot/CI gates.

title: Define snapshot policy for optimized vs pre-optimization AST under Reflaxe lifecycle
description: ReflectCompiler compiles at onAfterGenerate, which can normalize expressions/temporaries compared with prior onAfterTyping snapshots. Decide and document canonical policy (accept optimized output, or preserve pre-opt shape via explicit mode) and codify in tests/docs.
close_reason: Documented canonical post-Reflaxe snapshot shape policy and added optimized_ast_policy sentinel snapshot; full snapshot/CI gates green.

title: Add snapshot coverage for nested @hxml go_output detection
description: Create a snapshot case where go_output is provided only through nested @hxml includes to ensure BuildDetection enables compiler bootstrap/init correctly.
close_reason: Added core/nested_hxml_define_detection snapshot and fixed BuildDetection nested include parsing for both @include and .hxml include tokens with fallback candidate resolution.

title: Add snapshot bless mode
description: Implement --bless mode in test/run-snapshots.py to update only changed intended files and print a concise change-cause checklist for each blessed file; add docs and npm script.

title: Use GenericCompiler callback type queues in GoReflaxeCompiler
description: Collect ClassType/EnumType directly in compileClassImpl/compileEnumImpl and compile from selected typed collections, with safe fallback to module-based path when callbacks are empty.
close_reason: GoReflaxeCompiler now queues class/enum types directly from GenericCompiler callbacks and compiles via GoCompiler.compileSelectedTypes with module fallback; full snapshot and CI gates pass.

title: Support break/continue statements
description: Add lowering for TBreak and TContinue plus Go AST/printer support, and snapshot coverage for loop control flow semantics.

title: Support postfix inc/dec in expression contexts
description: Lower postfix OpIncrement/OpDecrement in expression position (for example call arguments) instead of fatal error, and add snapshot coverage for returned-value semantics.

title: Migrate GoReflaxeCompiler to GenericCompiler base
description: Replace BaseCompiler adapter with GenericCompiler-based implementation so class/enum selection is driven by compileClassImpl/compileEnumImpl callbacks and backend structure matches reusable Reflaxe target patterns.
close_reason: GoReflaxeCompiler now extends GenericCompiler and uses compileClassImpl/compileEnumImpl callbacks for module selection; snapshot and CI gates pass.

title: Support RestIterator lowering for varargs foreach
description: Varargs currently work for array-style access and while loops, but 'for (v in values)' over haxe.Rest lowers to TNew(haxe.iterators.RestIterator, ...) which is not yet lowered. Add TNew + iterator pathway so varargs foreach is supported without workaround.

title: Support compound assignment operators
description: Implement OpAssignOp lowering for statement and expression contexts (for example i += 2 and value = i += 2) with snapshot coverage.

title: Enable real parallel snapshot jobs
description: Implement actual parallel case execution for --jobs in test/run-snapshots.py while preserving deterministic case ordering and output summary.

title: Harden BuildDetection hxml token parsing for tab/whitespace separators
description: Replace simple space-split tokenization in BuildDetection with whitespace-aware scanner and add regression snapshot where go_output define is provided with tab-separated -D syntax in nested hxml include.
close_reason: Replaced hxml space-split parsing with whitespace/quote-aware tokenization in BuildDetection and added nested quoted-define regression snapshot coverage; full snapshot and CI gates pass.

title: Add process lock to snapshot harness to prevent concurrent out-dir races
description: run-snapshots.py should enforce a cross-process lock so concurrent harness invocations cannot clobber shared out/ folders; include timeout option and harden cleanup against transient missing paths.
close_reason: Added process-level run lock to run-snapshots.py with configurable timeout and cleanup hardening to prevent concurrent out-dir races; documented behavior in test README.

title: Fix unsigned right shift semantics
description: Lower OpUShr using unsigned 32-bit shift semantics instead of signed >>, and add snapshot coverage for negative values.

title: Phase 5: Hardening + Agent Docs
description: Stability, pass-registry validation, CI chunking, and policy docs.

title: Milestone 11: CI stability + docs
description: Registry validation, chunking, and durable docs.

title: Add AGENTS policy docs
description: Root and std agent instruction docs for contributors/agents.

title: Implement pass registry modularization + validation
description: Unique names, dependency resolution, cycle checks.

title: Implement harness chunking and rerun ergonomics
description: Stable --chunk, --failed, --changed flows.

title: Stabilize CI scripts and npm command surface
description: Finalize test command ergonomics and stability guardrails.

title: Fix do-while lowering semantics
description: Respect TWhile normalWhile flag by emitting proper do-while behavior (first iteration always executes and continue still re-checks condition) and add snapshot coverage.

title: Phase 3: OO + Advanced Semantics
description: Implement OO dispatch, enums, switch, and exceptions.

title: Milestone 5: Classes + fields/methods
description: Class lowering without inheritance and deterministic mangling.

title: Lower classes to structs (no inheritance)
description: Instance fields, methods, and constructors.

title: Implement static field/method lowering
description: Top-level static symbol strategy in generated Go.

title: Implement deterministic Go naming
description: Add namespace-safe mangling and keyword escaping.

title: Add class/static/mangling snapshots
description: Coverage for collisions and class behavior.

title: Milestone 6: Inheritance + virtual dispatch
description: Self-dispatch strategy for override-correct behavior.

title: Implement self-dispatch runtime pattern
description: Introduce __hx_this interfaces and struct wiring.

title: Rewrite virtual call sites and super calls
description: Route base-typed virtual calls through __hx_this and bypass for super.

title: Implement ctor chain wiring + minimal downcast
description: Ensure constructor chains initialize dispatch correctly.

title: Add inheritance dispatch snapshot suite
description: Override dispatch, super calls, and base-typed references.

title: Milestone 7: Enums + switch
description: Enum representation and switch lowering.

title: Implement enum runtime representation
description: Interface + constructor struct representation.

title: Lower switch expressions/statements
description: Primitive switch and enum switch/type-switch lowering.

title: Add Option/Result handling hooks
description: Keep option/result modeling stable through lowering.

title: Add enums/switch snapshot suite
description: Coverage for bindings and basic option/result cases.

title: Milestone 8: Exceptions
description: throw/try/catch mapping via panic/recover runtime helpers.

title: Add runtime exception helpers
description: panic/recover wrappers for Haxe exception behavior.

title: Lower try/catch semantics
description: Map throw/try/catch with typed catch filters where possible.

title: Implement haxe.Exception subset
description: Support enough exception APIs for core std usage.

title: Add exception snapshot suite
description: Coverage for throw, custom throw, and catch behavior.

title: Phase 1: Scaffold + Harness Foundation
description: Foundation setup for toolchain, macros, and snapshot harness.

title: Milestone 0: Repo scaffold + harness foundation
description: Scaffold repo and deterministic harness before real codegen.

title: Create toolchain/config scaffold files
description: Add .haxerc, package.json, haxelib.json, and extraParams.hxml.

title: Implement CompilerBootstrap classpath injection
description: Add front-loaded classpath injection logic for vendor and std paths.

title: Implement CompilerInit gating and registration stub
description: Add go target detection and compiler registration / explicit scaffold error path.

title: Implement snapshot harness skeleton
description: Create deterministic test/run-snapshots.py with selectors and timeout plumbing.

title: Add first snapshot case and test docs
description: Add core/hello snapshot fixture, test README, and test ignore rules.

title: Milestone 1: Minimal Go emission builds
description: Emit minimal Go main and pass compile/build snapshot loop.

title: Add minimal GoAST and GoASTPrinter
description: Support package/imports/main function printing.

title: Add minimal GoCompiler and GoOutputIterator
description: Compile Main.main into minimal Go AST and output file.

title: Add minimal runtime/hxrt and copy path
description: Emit minimal runtime package and copy into output.

title: Extend harness with gofmt/go test/diff
description: Wire gofmt, go test ./..., and intended/out diffing.

title: Add hello_trace snapshot and intended output
description: Golden snapshot for first emitted Go program.

title: Finalize go.mod generation policy
description: Decide always-generate vs test-only and deterministic constraints.

title: Fix unsigned shift assign-op semantics
description: Ensure OpAssignOp(OpUShr) uses unsigned 32-bit semantics (same as OpUShr) and add snapshot coverage for >>>=.

title: Unify Go build detection across bootstrap and compiler init
description: Extract robust build-target detection into shared utility and use it from CompilerBootstrap and CompilerInit to avoid drift. Include nested @hxml define scanning with relative include resolution.
close_reason: Added shared BuildDetection utility and unified CompilerBootstrap/CompilerInit target detection logic, including nested @hxml define scanning with relative include resolution.

title: Support prefix inc/dec in expression contexts
description: Lower prefix OpIncrement/OpDecrement when used as expressions (for example call arguments) instead of fatal error, preserving return-new-value semantics and adding snapshot coverage.

title: Add string compound-assign snapshot
description: Add coverage for String += semantics with null and mixed operand types to validate OpAssignOp StringConcat lowering.

title: Add go_native goroutine + error result mapping coverage
description: Implement function-type lowering needed for callable go-native helpers, add Go.spawn support, and add go_native/goroutine_smoke + go_native/error_result_mapping snapshots.

title: Phase 2: Core Language Semantics
description: Implement portable core expression/function semantics.

title: Milestone 2: Expressions + primitives
description: Portable primitive/expression lowering with string semantics.

title: Implement primitive type mapping
description: Define portable mappings and string policy plumbing.

title: Implement expression lowering for core control flow
description: Arithmetic, bool ops, locals, assignment, if/else, return.

title: Add runtime string semantic helpers
description: StringFromLiteral, concat, eq, and Std.string-compatible helpers.

title: Add primitive/expression snapshot suite
description: Add arithmetic, if_else, null concat, and locals snapshots.

title: Milestone 3: Arrays + loops
description: Array semantics and loop lowering coverage.

title: Choose and implement array representation
description: Implement hxrt.Array or equivalent portable strategy.

title: Lower array operations
description: Array literals, indexing, length, push/pop semantics.

title: Lower loop constructs
description: while, range loops, and array iteration behavior.

title: Add arrays/loops snapshot suite
description: Snapshot coverage for array and loop semantics.

title: Research runtime generics strategy
description: Decide when/how to adopt Go generics in runtime after foundation stabilizes.

title: Milestone 4: Functions + closures
description: Closures, function values, default args, varargs.

title: Lower static and local functions
description: Support function declarations and values.

title: Implement closure capture semantics
description: Ensure captured locals produce correct runtime behavior.

title: Implement default args and varargs mapping
description: Lower optional/default parameters and variadics.

title: Add functions/closures snapshot suite
description: Coverage for closures, function values, varargs.

title: Phase 4: Stdlib Ladder + Go-Native
description: Implement high-signal stdlib support and Go-native APIs/profiles.

title: Milestone 9: Stdlib parity ladder
description: High-signal stdlib coverage with upstream sweep.

title: Implement upstream stdlib sweep framework
description: Add module list and sweep runner for early parity gaps.

title: Implement Json/Bytes/IO stdlib modules
description: High-signal stdlib modules for practical programs.

title: Implement ds maps/list + initial sys support
description: IntMap/StringMap/ObjectMap/List and incremental sys modules.

title: Add stdlib/sys snapshot suite
description: Coverage and integration with sweep checks.

title: Re-evaluate multi-package output design
description: Assess import graph and cycle strategy once stdlib ladder matures.

title: Milestone 10: Go-native profiles/surface
description: Profiles, strict boundaries, and std/go APIs.

title: Implement profile resolver and diagnostics
description: portable/idiomatic/gopher/metal conflict handling.

title: Implement boundary and strict mode enforcers
description: __go__ purity boundary and strict compile policy.

title: Implement std/go native API surface
description: Go, Chan, Result, Error, Slice, and Map modules.

title: Add go_native snapshot suite
description: Coverage for channels, goroutines, and error mapping.
